org.apache.flink.mesos.runtime.clusterframework.services

接口 MesosServices

  • 所有已知实现类:
    AbstractMesosServices, StandaloneMesosServices, ZooKeeperMesosServices

    public interface MesosServices
    Service factory interface for Mesos.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void close(boolean cleanup)
      Closes all state maintained by the mesos services implementation.
      MesosWorkerStore createMesosWorkerStore(Configuration configuration, java.util.concurrent.Executor executor)
      Creates a MesosWorkerStore which is used to persist mesos worker in high availability mode.
      MesosArtifactServer getArtifactServer()
      Gets the artifact server with which to serve essential resources to task managers.
      akka.actor.ActorSystem getLocalActorSystem()
      Gets a local ActorSystem which is used for child actors within MesosResourceManager.

    • 方法详细资料

      • createMesosWorkerStore

        MesosWorkerStore createMesosWorkerStore(Configuration configuration,
                                        java.util.concurrent.Executor executor)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a MesosWorkerStore which is used to persist mesos worker in high availability mode.
        参数:
        configuration - to be used
        executor - to run asynchronous tasks
        返回:
        a mesos worker store
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - if the mesos worker store could not be created

      • getLocalActorSystem

        akka.actor.ActorSystem getLocalActorSystem()
        Gets a local ActorSystem which is used for child actors within MesosResourceManager.
        返回:
        a reference to an actor system.

      • getArtifactServer

        MesosArtifactServer getArtifactServer()
        Gets the artifact server with which to serve essential resources to task managers.
        返回:
        a reference to an artifact server.

      • close

        void close(boolean cleanup)
    throws java.lang.Exception
        Closes all state maintained by the mesos services implementation.
        参数:
        cleanup - is true if a cleanup shall be performed
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - if the closing operation failed
